entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 60 percent chance of showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 24. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:31 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Amount 5 mm. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:31 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 14.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 early in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:31 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
